content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr. Chan Bee Ting is currently an Assistant Professor at the Department of Mechanical, Materials and Manufacturing Engineering, University of Nottingham Malaysia. She received her B.Eng (Hons), MEngSc and Ph.D. in Biomedical Engineering from the University of Malaya (UM). Dr. Chan also obtained the teaching qualification of the Postgraduate Certificate of Higher Education (PGCHE) from the University of Nottingham. She is a Fellow of the Higher Education Academy (UK). Her research interests include computational heart modeling, medical image processing and analysis, biomechanics, and physiological measurement. Convenor: Finite Element Analysis (Level 4) Contributor: Mechanics of Solids (Level 2), Computing Modelling Techniques (Level 3) Tutor: Statics and Dynamics (Level 1), Design, Manufacture & Project (Year 2) Supervisor: BEng/ MEng/ MSc Individual Projects Computational Heart Modelling, Medical Image Processing & Analysis, Biomechanics, Physiological Measurement, Stress evaluation telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
